Reason: The configuration option _transientMode is performance-sensitive. The code context shows that depending on the value of _transientMode, either a TransientJournal or a PersistentJournal is created in the journal() method. This decision directly impacts the performance of the system as using a TransientJournal may result in faster but less durable journaling, while using a PersistentJournal may provide more durability at the cost of performance. Therefore, the configuration _transientMode involves performance-related operations that lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
